name: Aqua's Journey
description:
You're Aqua, a little water drop creature that needs to survive in an abandoned city full of contamination and other dangerous obstacles to water.

In this platformer adventure you will have to take Aqua safely to the water fountain that is at the end of each level, collecting water drops along the way.

The water drops can be used for extra life points or you can shoot them as projectiles to destroy some obstacles with them, but remember that your water is limited, so use it wisely.

Credits:

Music made by: Something2

Some tileset graphics used: software_atelier

Thanks to my friend Ricardo Tapia for the english and spanish translations c:

This game was originally created for the LEIVA 2020 videogame showcase.
More info here (only in spanish)

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Jump with Space
  • Shoot with C or Ctrl-Left
  • Interact with E
  • Pause with Esc (P in browser version)

For the completionists there is a bonus level and 5 secret story dialogues, good luck finding them c;

*Downloadable versions have an automatic save system included

And always remember: Water is life...
